title: Leaverbuster Issue
body:
Hi, I'm not sure if I've actually been disconnecting at all from games, or going afk, because I pretty much never do, but I was placed into a low priority queue after disconnecting once. Once. Why did this occur? Does it also apply to dodging games? Why do you have an automated system in place which fails to work properly?

If dodging games is also "problematic" then why can't we have a system which allows the team to vote to dodge, or a pre-game report system which allows us to report the pre-game chat (which I believe is currently unrecorded) and dodge the game? Obviously false reporters will be punished, but it's such an easy system to put in place and monitor, you just need a few guys (or player-based tribunal (wink wink, nudge nudge)) going through chat logs and scanning for people saying "I'm going to feed," or just generally being toxic.

In general, can we actually just get a real report system? I play with plenty of people who are toxic or actually boosted and report them, but I've only ONCE received confirmation of their punishment, which tells me either toxic players are slipping through your automated system or you simply don't consider them toxic.

A player by the name of Dong Huap made a video detailing how your system picks up on target words. TARGET WORDS. According to him, if I say "Draven, would you kindly end your disgusting, worthless existence," I won't be picked up on the system because I didn't say "Go kill yourself" in the traditional manner. This is a huge problem. Hell, we saw with Dunkey's exit from the game that the system in fact favours intentional feeders and trolls who are able to act like they're really trying their best, but in fact aren't. Honestly, I'd be a large sum that if I was given a diamond ranked account, I could demote it to bronze V in 30 days by intentionally trying to lose games and still not get suspended or banned. A lot of players are able to get away with feeding and trolling by acting innocent, I've seen it firsthand, they even try to play victim and blame you for flaming them even if they're the ones that flame, but I never get confirmation or feedback of their punishment.

I don't know if you're working on this, or how the system works, but please, we need a better system. Automated systems NEVER cut it in this case. You wouldn't trust the entire justice system on a computer, so why would you trust this with one? We need a tribunal back, even if you guys are running it, even if there's some kind of specific system which selects certain individuals who are considered non-toxic to be judges.

replies.body: It is possible to be punished for just one leave, and this usually triggers when you leave a ranked game (you failed to connect in your kha game 4 days ago) or when you don't have many games played. You can read about it in the leaverbuster FAQ[ here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).
